text: Odd Future is a group of hip hop musicians from Los Angeles, United States. It was formed in 2007 by Tyler, The Creator. Members of Odd Future include: Earl Sweatshirt, Lucas Vercetti, Syd Tha Kys, Frank Ocean, Tyler, The Creator, Hodgy, L-Boy, Travis Bennett, Jasper Dolphin, Mike G, Domo Genesis, Left Brain, Casey Veggies, Brandun DeShay, Vritra, Sagan Lockhart, Dark Shark, Matt Martians, Sage Elsesser, Gilbert Wallace, Na-Kel Smith, Kris Benton, Hal Williams. == Other websites == * Official website Category:2000s American music groups Category:2007 establishments in California Category:2010s American music groups Category:Hip hop bands Category:Musical groups established in 2007 Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Odd Future
